name: Kid606
description: '''Miguel Trost De Pedro''' (born July 27, 1979), better known by his [[stage name]] '''Kid606''', is an [[electronic music]]ian who was raised in [[San Diego]] and later moved to [[San Francisco]]. He is most closely associated with the [[Glitch (music)|glitch]], [[Intelligent dance music|IDM]], [[hardcore techno]] and [[breakcore]] scenes.
